text: The Federal Corvette is a combat-focused ship manufactured by Core Dynamics, produced from 3301 to the present. It is the third largest ship on the private market, surpassed only by the Beluga Liner and the Imperial Cutter. The Corvette is known for its exceptional combat capabilities, with a high damage output and mobility for its size. It has a cargo capacity of up to 618 tons, making it a viable freighter, but its low jump range can hinder long-distance travel.

The Federal Corvette has a hull mass of 900 tons, with an armour rating of 666 and armour hardness of 70. It has shields of 519 MJ and a heat capacity of 333. The ship's dimensions are 167.8m x 87.2m x 28.3m, and it can accommodate 3-4 pilots with multicrew support. It has a top speed of 198 m/s (default) or 232 m/s (upgraded), a boost speed of 257 m/s (default) or 302 m/s (upgraded), and an unladen jump range of 6.31 ly (default) or 21.15 ly (upgraded). The cargo capacity is 76 tons (default) or 618 tons (max).

The Federal Corvette features 8 utility mounts, 2 small hardpoints, 2 medium hardpoints, 1 large hardpoint, and 2 huge hardpoints. It also has internal compartments including 1 Class 1, 1 Class 3, 2 Class 4, 2 Class 5, 2 Class 6, and 3 Class 7 compartments, with 2 Class 5 military compartments reserved. The default loadout includes a Power Plant (Class 8, Grade E), Thrusters (Class 7, Grade E), Frame Shift Drive (Class 6, Grade E), Life Support (Class 5, Grade E), Power Distributor (Class 8, Grade E), Sensors (Class 8, Grade E), Fuel Tank (Class 5, Grade C), Shield Generator (Class 7, Grade E), and various cargo racks.
